description:
Canvas Design is an all-in-one, AI-powered, easy-to-use graphic design, flyer & poster maker, logo maker, and photo editor app for designing anything in a minute.

Zero experience? No worries! Just pick a template & get creative whether you’re using the flyer maker, invitation maker, or AI background remover, Canvas Design makes designing easy for everyone.

Create stunning posters, logos, flyers, invitation cards, banners, product shots, photo collages, social media posts, brochures, business cards, thumbnails, profile pic, and more without any design skills, using the canvas design & logo maker app.

50,000+ DESIGN TEMPLATES
• Logo templates, including text, monogram, emblem, mascot, minimalist, vintage, abstract, & more
• Poster templates & flyer templates for business, events, movies, education, promos, & more with poster creator
• Invitation templates for birthdays, weddings, baby showers, festival, and more with invitation card maker
• Social media templates, including Instagram post templates, IG stories, & Facebook posts
• Brochure maker, business card maker, & YouTube thumbnail templates

CANVAS AI CREATION
• AI Logo Maker - Just enter your brand name and choose style, and the AI generates an amazing logo for your brand
• AI Photo Generator - Turn text into high-quality unique photos from just text to image
• AI Creation - Simply just type a prompt and i will generate stunning art, sticker, cartoon, anime, and tattoo design in second

POSTER MAKER
• Choose from a wide range of poster templates or start from scratch with poster maker
• Magically resize your poster design with one click for any social media platform

FLYER MAKER
• Flyer designs for beauty, sports, music, automotive, pet, campaigns, and entertainment with flyer maker
• Create modern & stylish flyer templates with flyer creator

LOGO MAKER
• Create a brand identity using our AI logo generator or use custom logo templates to simplifies logo design
• Logo creator text curve tools let you bend or arc text for typography

INVITATION MAKER
• Design invitation cards from a beautiful invitation card templates for weddings, birthdays, parties, and events
• Personalize text, backgrounds, graphics, and design to match your invitation templates theme

SOCIAL MEDIA POST MAKER
• Templates for Instagram posts, TikTok, Facebook posts, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, and more
• Profile pictures & covers with instagram post maker

PHOTO EDITOR
• Photo editing with AI BG Remover, instantly change and remove backgrounds & create product cutout shots using AI Background Remover
• Layouts templates for grids, photo collage & graphic design

ELEMENTS LIBRARY
• Include thousands of stickers, graphics, shapes, and license free images
• 5,000+ fonts to make unique typographic designs

For every story, product, or moment worth sharing — design it beautifully with AI.

It all starts with an idea — a business you want to launch, a party you’re excited to host, a message you need the world to see. But turning that idea into a design? That used to mean hours learning complicated tools — or hiring someone else.

Not anymore!!!

Meet your new design companion — Poster Maker: AI Flyer Design. Whether you're planning an event, building your brand, or just sharing a thought on your favorite platform — we give you the power to create stunning posters, flyers, logos, banners, and social media posts in minutes — no design skills required.

---

Design in Seconds. Impress for Days.

Bring your boldest ideas to life.

With 20,000+ fully customizable templates, you're never starting from scratch. Just pick a layout, plug in your message, and watch your ideas come alive — faster than ever.

From bold posters and elegant invitations to eye-catching Instagram stories and professional logos, you’ll find every format for every occasion.

---

Why People Love It:

AI Poster Generation
Type in your idea — like “Party flyer with neon theme” or “Elegant wedding invite” — and let AI instantly turn it into a ready-made design you can edit.

AI-Powered Templates
Let our smart engine recommend beautiful, ready-to-use layouts tailored to your purpose.

Beginner-Friendly Interface
No clutter. No confusion. Just powerful, easy-to-use tools that guide you every step of the way.

20,000+ Templates for Every Use
Posters. Flyers. Logos. Business cards. Invitations. Social media posts. Product and brand cutout. All fully editable.

Total Customization Control
Change text, swap images, adjust colors, add icons — all with drag-and-drop ease.

100+ Designer Fonts
Make your words pop with curated typography that fits your style and mood.

Built for Business and Social
Perfect for promoting events, products, services, or simply making your content shine on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and more.

Save, Share & Reuse
Export in high resolution, save your work for later, and revisit designs whenever inspiration strikes.

---

One App. Endless Possibilities.

- Poster Maker AI – Launch ideas that stand out, from storefront posters to digital announcements using AI.
- Flyer Designer – Promote sales, events, and offers with stunning one-pagers.
- Logo Maker – Build a brand identity that’s both personal and professional.
- Invitation Maker – Craft heartfelt invites for weddings, birthdays, and celebrations.
- Social Media Editor – Create scroll-stopping posts and stories in just a few taps.
- Banner Creator – Design promotional banners, ads, and website headers with ease.
- AI Design Tools – Work faster and smarter with tools like AI Art Generator, Background Remover, Object Eraser, Image Upscaler, Photo Colorizer, and more — all built to save time and boost creativity.

---

Made for Creators, Entrepreneurs & Everyday Storytellers

Whether you're a small business owner, marketer, student, or influencer — Poster Maker helps you tell your story with style. Design isn’t just for professionals anymore — it’s for you.

---

Try It Free — Create More with Poster Maker Pro

Unlock the full library, advanced editing tools, premium fonts, and more with Poster Maker Pro.

- Start with a free trial
- Cancel anytime before the trial ends
- Annual plan available for ongoing access
For more details on managing subscriptions, visit: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

Privacy Policy: https://posterapplab.com/api/ios/privacy-policy.pdf
Terms of user: https://posterapplab.com/api/ios/terms.pdf

Loved by creators. Powered by AI. Built for impact.
Download Poster Maker today and bring your boldest ideas to life.

Transform your Instagram Profile into a professional look with Griddy – the All-In-One tool for creating grid posts, seamless carousel layouts, engaging instagram stories, and visually captivating content. Whether you’re an influencer, small business owner, or content creator, Griddy simplifies Instagram marketing like never before.

*** Key Features ***

1. Photo Splitter
Griddy makes it easy to split your photos into grid layouts for Instagram, with options for up to 10 rows (30 posts) to create eye-catching feed layout. YChoose from predefined grid layouts such as 1x3, 2x3, 3x3, or 4x3 with a single tap to quickly achieve a stunning Instagram feed or slice panorama photos into seamless carousel posts with ease.
For more control, you can split your photo into custom grid layouts and adjust the aspect ratio (landscape, square, portrait, story to fit your unique style.

2. Puzzle Feed Templates
Design seamless puzzle-style Instagram feeds with our aesthetic template. Perfect for creating a cohesive, professional look.

3. Carousel Post Maker
Turn your regular carousel posts into seamless photo collages or image galleries in seconds, ensuring your audience swipes for more.

4. Photo Collage Maker
Easily combine multiple photos with our easy-to-use, free photo collage maker app. Create beautiful collages from your photos and choose from dozens of creative layouts!

5. 500+ Customizable Templates
Choose from a diverse collection of fully customizable templates for different content types such as Grid Feeds, Carousel Posts, Stories, and Square Posts, curated for your business and brand.

6. Design Anything
Create on-trend Instagram posts with beautiful text fonts, stickers, and shapes. With our easy-to-use tools, you can do anything effortlessly with zoom & edit mode, working with layers, and multiple selection.

7. Add Text with Style
Enhance your posts with text effects like curved text, strokes, shadows, background colors, and rounded corners to make your captions pop.

8. Resize & Crop Photos
Quickly resize your photos to different Instagram Post sizes with a beautiful background color selection.

9. Watermark Tool
Protect your photos and content with an instant watermarking feature, ideal for maintaining your brand’s identity.

10. Brand Kit
Manage and apply your brand's logos, fonts, and colors to your designs easily. 
Import custom fonts to elevate your projects.

11. Preview Mode
See how your Instagram feed, carousel post, or story will look before sharing with your audience.

12. Share to Instagram
Export your grid or carousel posts directly to Instagram in HD quality with just a few taps.

Why Choose Griddy?
Griddy is your all-in-one solution for Instagram marketing, helping you:
• Split photos into Instagram grid layouts.
• Create seamless carousel posts from panoramic photos.
• Design professional-looking puzzle feeds.
• Save time with easy-to-use design tools.
• Grow your brand with visually stunning content.

Download Griddy Now!
Level up your Instagram profile with creative grids, seamless carousels, and aesthetic puzzle feeds. Whether you’re growing a brand or expressing your creativity, Griddy makes it easy and fun!

Follow us on Instagram @griddyapp to get inspired and explore amazing designs made with Griddy.

If you enjoy using Griddy, we’d love to hear from you! Leave a review or contact us at support@cornapps.com.

Privacy Policy: https://cornapps.com/griddyapp-terms#privacy

Reskin is the best solution for anyone who wants to make their phone screen unique and stylish - it's a complete customization tool for your iPhone.

Personalize your home screen with stunning themes, handcrafted wallpapers, and custom icons. Choose from a huge library of themed widgets, icons, and wallpapers, or easily create your own combinations to make your iPhone reflect your personality. 

Reskin is designed to be accessible to everyone - our quick and easy installation process allows you to personalize your iPhone in minutes.

What makes Reskin special? It offers a range of powerful features:

1. Two icon installation modes for maximum convenience:


Quick Installation: choose your icons, press one button, and Reskin will automatically install them on your phone. 
Manual Installation: download icons as images and create shortcuts manually using the standard "Shortcuts" app. This method ensures faster app opening.

2. Detailed video instructions for easy navigation. 


Reskin offers clear step-by-step video instructions for every stage of the installation process. Video instructions are available in a dedicated section of the app. 

3. Support for a wide range of apps. 
Reskin automatically scans your apps and offers custom icons for them.

4. A huge selection of widgets. 
 
Including different calendar widgets, battery widgets, and picture widgets. Find widgets and themes for every mood and occasion, from minimalist and elegant to vibrant and expressive.

Reskin is the ultimate iPhone customization tool, giving you complete control over your device's look and feel. Mix and match wallpapers, icons, and widgets to create a home screen that perfectly reflects your style.

FusionFaces - AI Reface & Photo Editor

Experience advanced AI-powered face swap technology with FusionFaces, offering precise and fast face transformation effects.
•	1-Minute Processing: Upload a photo, click the Swap button, and get satisfying results within a minute.
•	Creative Freedom: Use your own content — portraits, business photos, anime, or cartoons — FusionFaces brings them to life with seamless face swaps.
•	High Definition: Enjoy sharp and detailed outputs with professional-level quality.
•	Preset Templates: Access a wide variety of professional photography templates for instant results.
•	Privacy First: All uploaded photos are automatically deleted within 12 hours to protect your data.
•	Simple & Fun: Anyone can swap faces in seconds, no prior experience needed.

With just one photo, you can create:
•	Professional Headshots
•	Dating Profile Photos
•	Social Media Feed Photos
•	Gaming Avatars
•	Funny Memes
•	Gender Swap
•	Movie Character Swaps

Discover new looks and styles effortlessly!

TRY THESE FEATURES FOR FREE

---

THE FUN OF FACE SWAPPING
•	Swap with friends, celebrities, or even historical figures.
•	Create funny photos, memes, and collages, or just explore new looks.

BOOST YOUR ONLINE PRESENCE
•	Make striking AI avatars for social media, dating profiles, professional headshots, and more.
•	Upload your favorite photo and generate unique avatars in a range of styles.

Background and object removal can be super EASY & FAST! 

AnyEraser is an ultimate photo editor to remove background and objects with AI. No skills needed - just a tap to erase unwanted parts and enjoy a clear & stunning result.


** KEY HIGHLIGHTS **

- Remove Background
With intelligent AI technology, instantly detect and cut out photos, supporting seamless PNG export with transparent backgrounds

- Change Background
With 1000+ background templates, including professional product shots, portraits, travel spots, pets, skies, and more, unleash your creativity to its fullest

- Remove Objects
Use professional tools like brush or lasso to seamlessly erase any unwanted objects or imperfections with pixel-perfect accuracy

- Stylish Filters
Bring out your inner artist and apply vibrant filters to your photos. Transform your photos into stunning art that reflects your unique style

- Effortless Cropping
Crop images with pre-sized templates for social media and e-commerce platforms, boosting productivity and streamlining content promotion

- Save & Share
Export in HD without losing quality, keeping images clear and sharp. Save to your album or share with a tap to your favorite social media or messaging apps


** WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT **

Make Your Photos Shine
• Say goodbye to distractions in your photos! Instantly remove unwanted elements with smart AI, leaving behind clean and perfect memories
• Easily crop your images to the ideal size for Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more - ensuring you update your social feeds in seconds
• Showcase your creation! Share with friends or on social media in a single tap

Power Up Your Online Store
• Want pro-level images? Precisely erase background and export PNG images with transparent backgrounds to create flawless product visuals
• Effortlessly replace backgrounds with countless templates, making your listings go live 3X faster and catch the eye of more potential buyers
• Tailored cropping features made for e-commerce, perfectly adapting to sites like Amazon, Shopify, Poshmark, eBay, Temu, Shein, and more


Ready to make your photos stand out? Start today with AnyEraser, your custom photo studio, and create stunning & eye-catching artwork!

AnyEraser is a powerful photo editor, featuring tools for cutout, PNG generator, and powerful background remover. Easily remove objects and erase objects with precision, using AnyEraser's photo eraser and object removal tools. Plus, switch up your images with the photo background changer, designed for easy, professional edits.

"Unleash Your Inner Artist with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! 

Tired of generic phone backgrounds? Express your unique style and stay trendy with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! Your ultimate creative hub, packed with powerful tools to design stunning, personalized wallpapers. Best of all, it's FREE! 

Your phone reflects you, so we built this app for fun, easy customization. From cute aesthetics to dark vibes, cool anime to lively animals, there's something for everyone. Our mission: keep your screen fresh, trendy, and uniquely YOU!

Transform your photos and memories into captivating wallpapers! Our DIY Frame Wallpaper section offers a vast collection of stylish frames and templates.

- Dynamic & Static Frames: Live Frames add animations; Static Frames offer timeless elegance. Photos blend perfectly with our designs!

stickers: Add fun, trendy stickers from our diverse library to your masterpiece!

Beyond DIY, explore our incredible, **FREE** gallery of ready-to-use wallpapers, hand-picked and constantly updated with the hottest trends:

- Aesthetic Vibes: Dreamy pastels, minimalist designs.

Stay trendy! We constantly update our frames, stickers, and curated wallpapers with the latest mobile culture, from TikTok aesthetics to meme crazes. And yes, it's all FREE – creativity should have no bounds or price tags!

Download DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft now and transform your phone into a canvas of endless possibilities! Create, customize, captivate – all for FREE!

Mico — Your Home Screen Personalization App, fully optimized for OS 26！
Fully adapted for OS 26 — unlock customizable Animated Artwork, explore a wide range of popular 3D & Depth Effect Wallpapers, and enjoy the upgraded Liquid Glass Theme that brings a unique texture to your home screen.
【OS 26 Depth Effect Wallpaper & Liquid Glass Theme】
* Depth Effect Wallpaper：Specially optimized for OS 26, the all-new Depth Effect Wallpapers use intelligent layering and spatial design to seamlessly blend time and wallpaper elements, bringing a vivid sense of depth and personality to your screen.
* Liquid Glass Theme：Explore the artistic fusion of light and fluid textures, unlocking a fresh and unique visual experience.

【DIY Live Wallpapers & Battery Icon Wallpaper】
Supports static/dynamic wallpaper creation, with a wide range of templates like Polaroid, heart collage, flip cards, labubu live wallpaper, and more. There are also various battery icon stickers and battery widget to personalize the top status bar of your phone, making your wallpapers even more fun. Your home screen becomes a unique design that's truly your own.

【Theme Template, One-Click To Use】 
Mico's theme pack lets you mix and match stylish widgets and lock screen templates to create a home screen that's uniquely yours. Top widgets and stunning wallpapers created by designers from around the world—yours to use with just a tap. Effortlessly design your perfect home screen.

【Home & Lock Screen Widgets】 
Transform your iOS experience with customizable widgets for both Home Screen and Lock Screen!  
*Couple widget: Couple widgets let you and your partner share a little love right on your home screens. No matter how far apart you are, you’ll always feel connected.
*Battery widget: The Battery Widget not only shows your power level but also matches your home screen aesthetic with customizable styles and themes.
*Photo widget: provide a variety of styles of photo frames, cute pets, retro game consoles, movie film styles, everything 
*Animation widgets: emoticon packs, flashing emoticons, GIF, bear emoticon animations, cute cat animations, flashing hearts... 

【New iOS 18 Widgets & Themes】
Fully compatible with iOS 18 – supports customizing the control center and lock screen buttons, with plenty of cute, text, and animated icons. 

【Support Apple Health Tracking】 
Mico Lock Screen Widget integrates Apple Health App to display health data such as steps in widgets. If you want to use a super widget that contains health data, please allow the APP to access health data when entering the widget preview page.

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.

Transform your living space with DecAI™, where designing your dream home is as simple as snapping a photo by AI.

► AI Interior Design & Decor
Just upload an image of your room, choose the type of space and the style you want. Our advanced AI technology will analyze your room's dimensions and characteristics, then generate a stunning interior design plan catered to your taste. From modern chic to rustic warmth, our AI interior designer presents you with a visualization of furniture arrangements, color palettes, and decorative accents that bring your personal touch to life. 

► AI Garden Design
Upload a snapshot of your yard, patio or rooftop, and watch as our advanced AI crafts personalized garden designs in seconds—no green thumb needed. From tropical oases to cottage-core charm, our technology tailors layouts with seasonal blooms, winding pathways, and cozy seating zones, matching your style and space dimensions. Visualize drought-resistant plantings, modern hardscaping, or vibrant flower beds before breaking ground, and unlock endless possibilities for backyard makeovers, balcony retreats, or front-yard curb appeal. 

► AI Exterior Design & Renovation
Transform your home's exterior and garden with AI-powered design tools, visualize your dream space. Get rid of design constraints with a multitude of novel ideas for your home's exterior design. Simply upload a picture of your house, choose your preferred style, and the AI will provide you with a personalized design plan.

► Transform Any Item with Replace
Unlimited Creativity with Seamless Replacement – Tired of your current furniture or decorations? The Replace feature lets you erase unwanted items and input what you’d like to see instead, generating a new image to breathe new life into your home.


► Discover New Walls
Revamp your room's look with "New Walls." Swap textures and colors with ease, visualizing the perfect wall finish without lifting a paintbrush. Our AI ensures every suggestion aligns with your vision.

► Preview Your Flooring Choices
Why wait for the perfect flooring when you can see it instantly? Our "Instantly Install New Flooring" feature lets you preview a wide selection of flooring options, from hardwood to tile, right on your device.

► Explore Room Design Ideas
Looking for a little inspiration? "AI Interior Design" is your go-to source for a plethora of room design ideas.

Clip Studio Paint makes drawing a piece of cake, in any style!
Whether you are a beginner or a pro, Clip Studio Paint will improve every aspect of your art experience, while helping you grow as an artist.

Unlimited amount of brushes at your fingertips to recreate any style
- Use brushes with the same textures as real art materials
- Adjust details such as brush shape and paper quality to your liking
- Make unique colors with realistic color mixing, like traditional paints
- Draw with transparency to erase, so no need to switch brushes

Countless artist-made materials 
- Level up your art with free materials, for backgrounds and more
- Discover community-made brushes from creators worldwide
- Add details with materials like frills and more 

Coloring made easy
- Easily color even with line gaps using the magnetic lasso tool
- Lock transparency to paint over layers without affecting other areas
- Set light source and shadow position with Shading Assist
- Instantly reference and apply colors from an image to your art using Color Match
- Enhance your art with filters like Chromatic Aberration, Retro Film, Pencil, and more

Learn alongside other creators
- Loads of official tutorials and creator tips available 
- Watch tutorials on the Clip Studio Paint YouTube channel, for step-by-step advice
- Ask questions on the Clip Studio Ask community

Create the perfect reference with 3D models
- Use 3D drawing figures to help out your anatomy
- Customize character face and body models with beginner-friendly tools
- Attach 3D objects like hats and shoes to characters for more specific references
- Use 3D shapes to draw perspective
- Use snap to quickly place objects on your canvas 

Adjust after you draw
- Liquify to make adjustments to the balance of your illustrations
- Mesh Transformation allows you to transform to different shapes
- Change up the poses of your character drawings with Puppet warp
- Non-destructive color adjustment layers to get your art just right
- Gradient maps give color to your grayscale illustrations

Stress-free layer features
- Assign colors and make multiple columns of layers to browse them at a glance
- Enjoy the freedom of masking and clipping on multiple layers to edit and move your work
- Add various effects to apply to the layer in a non-destructive way

The ultimate comic creation app
- All the tools you need for comic creation, from sketches to finishing touches
- Panel frames, speech balloons, text, effect lines, and screen tones in an instant
- Make high-resolution print data (6 GB+ memory recommended)
- Manage multi-page projects

Professional animation, on any device
- Use all the same tools as animation studios
- Unique features allow you to draw your frames as you like
- Enjoy a pencil and paper look and feel, but digitally
- Expand your drawings to 4K resolution without losing quality by saving it as vector data
